short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parses the page of a sound hosted on freesound.org and extracts the CDN link to the hosted mp3

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on is specifically made to make the workflow simple when using freesound.org samples when doing music live-coding with the music programming language Strudel. To do this you need to find the cdn-link where the mp3 is hosted, and fetch that in your Strudel patch. This software was made within a research project at Chalmers University of Technology in GÃ¶teborg, Sweden, to teach programming to kids.

This add-on might have other use-cases that the developer has not thought of.
